ch0249_00_rulina/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. You’ve got
a good look on your face today. It’s as good as
any model’s, I’d say.
ch0249_00_rulina/0101_0701_02_10:
I’ll keep on swimming so I don’t get washed away
by your momentum!
ch0249_00_rulina/7101_0701_02_10:
When I’m fishing, I get excited wondering what
sort of Pokémon will take the bait and how the
encounter might unfold.
ch0249_00_rulina/7101_0701_03_10:
There’s a tension to it that I find charming. It’s not
unlike taking on the Gym Challenge!
ch0249_00_rulina/7102_0701_01_10:
I met Sonia when I did my Gym Challenge, and
we’re still good friends to this day.
ch0249_00_rulina/7102_0701_02_10:
Though we’ve chosen different paths in life, she
still understands me and what I go through.
ch0249_00_rulina/7102_0701_03_10:
She’s saved me so many times. I just love her
positive personality!
ch0249_00_rulina/7103_0701_01_10:
I hear that many strong sync pairs have gathered
here on Pasio.
ch0249_00_rulina/7103_0701_02_10:
I’m going to train by challenging the Grass-type
sync pairs first!
ch0249_00_rulina/7103_0701_03_10:
Then, once I’ve gotten stronger, I’m going to
ask Milo for a rematch—and this time, I’ll be
the victor!
ch0249_00_rulina/7104_0701_01_10:
I think it’s normal to feel frustrated when
you lose.
ch0249_00_rulina/7104_0701_02_10:
But I don’t stop there—I also try to analyze what
went wrong!
ch0249_00_rulina/7104_0701_03_10:
If you stop thinking, you limit how much you
can grow.
ch0249_00_rulina/7105_0701_01_10:
A model, by definition, is one who serves as an
example to others.
ch0249_00_rulina/7105_0701_02_10:
That means at any given moment, wherever they
happen to be, others are watching them.
ch0249_00_rulina/7105_0701_03_10:
By that standard, I would also consider you a
model, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0249_00_rulina/7105_0701_04_10:
The way you care for your Pokémon makes you
a wonderful role model for other Trainers.
ch0249_00_rulina/1701_0701_02_10:
I’ve got something for you. You can have it, if
you like!
ch0249_00_rulina/1701_0702_01_10:
With that refined mind of yours, I’m sure you’ll
make good use of that.
ch0249_00_rulina/2501_0701_01_10:
When I let go and allow the waves to carry me,
I feel like I’m the only one in the world.
ch0249_00_rulina/2501_0701_02_10:
That’s what I do to relax whenever I’m feeling
down or tired.
ch0249_00_rulina/2501_0701_03_10:
Try to keep that a secret from everyone
else, though.
ch0249_00_rulina/2501_0702_01_10: I let the waves wash away all my bad feelings.
ch0249_00_rulina/2501_0702_02_10:
That’s why I can fight the good fight again today,
both in Pokémon battles and in modeling!
ch0249_00_rulina/2511_0701_01_10: I won’t cut corners as a Gym Leader or a model.
ch0249_00_rulina/2511_0701_02_10:
Doing so would only let down everyone who looks
up to me.
ch0249_00_rulina/2511_0701_03_10: And I would be letting myself down, too.
ch0249_00_rulina/2511_0701_04_10:
That’s why I’m always aiming to be number one,
with all I’ve got!
ch0249_00_rulina/2511_0702_01_10:
Putting one hundred percent of your energy into
something can be rather taxing.
ch0249_00_rulina/2511_0702_02_10:
But that effort is what allows you to go one step
beyond everyone else.
ch0249_00_rulina/2511_0702_03_10:
And why wouldn’t you want to stand out from
the crowd?
ch0249_00_rulina/3001_0701_01_10:
Oh hey! My partner and I just got back from our
morning swim. A quick splash in the ocean always
wakes us right up!
ch0249_00_rulina/3003_0701_01_10:
Pasio’s brilliant, isn’t it! The fact that there are
other Trainers here who model and act gives me
such good motivation!
ch0249_00_rulina/3005_0701_01_10:
Hey, how’s your day going? My partner and I are
ready for a deep massage after all the swimming
we did today!
